website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a premium pair of wireless earbuds but baulk at the prices these usually command, then the Lypertek TEVI are for you. Great sounds, huge battery life, and all for less than £100/$100.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had these for couple of days now and used for quite few hours per day and still plenty of battery charge left, really amazed with that. Sound quality is great. When speaking to someone on my mobile their voice was clear and they could hear me with no problems. Works perfectly while exercising, the earbuds stay in your ears very well. Also very important for me is the design, they look very smart and they do not stick out much. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewGuna

customer_reviews.title: Stellar performance from a sub £100 true wireless model
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality with clear yet full bass that gives them a little warmth overall, however vocals are still detailed and the treble is precise but never sharp. I was not expecting this level of sound quality, combined with stable Bluetooth connectivity and outstanding battery life for under £100. Very well built with a great case and tips, easy to pair and the 10hr battery life quoted is very realistic, only slightly lower when using a high quality codec like AptX. The case has a USB-C charging port and gives them an extra 6 charges! These are perfect for out and about use, daily commuting or exercise due to their IPX7 rating. Overall I am extremely happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Louise

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Two weeks and still waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.text: There is no noise cancellation but they do isolate external sounds reasonably well. There was a problem with the volume in the right earphone so had to return them. I know we're in lockdown and these are extraordinary times but I'm getting very frustrated with Amazon returns. Nearly two weeks after taking the earphones to an Amazon locker, the status in my account is still shown as 'waiting to receive your item'.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Insane value proposition
customer_reviews.text: I recently jumped on the TWS bandwagon and have been obsessing over the 1MORE Stylish buds for a while. I wanted something similar but with IPX rating for water-resistance and USB-C charging. These earbuds are the ones I was recommended by many professional reviewers. All I'm going to say is that they punch above their weight, the pricing of these buds is very competitive against something like the Sennheiser Momentum earbuds. Volume can go really high and the battery life claims are high, but that will have to be tested as its based on SBC at 50% volume and not aptX or AAC. Solid first impressions on these buds so far, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul M.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair but Bluetooth kept cutting out at the gym when phone placed on the floor.....very strange. Exchanged for another pair but have experienced similar issues sometimes when just walking around. By deduction I think the Bluetooth connection is really poor and I have to reset to get working again. Positives though are amazing sound....clean and crisp no overwhelming bass...I am an audiophile so like my music pure. Fit is good and battery life stupendous. Overall a mixed bag....such a shame
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: Don't be afraid of true wireless
customer_reviews.text: I was EXTREMELY skeptical about going totally wireless, but the Tevis have been a really pleasant surprise. I broke my last pair of bluetooth headphones fairly quickly and a friend suggested giving these a try. Connection is great, they seem very robust and the charging case makes them very easy to use. I just pop them back in the case after I use them and top up the charge in the case every couple of weeks. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Packham

customer_reviews.title: Great option if you don't like bass
customer_reviews.text: These earphones have exceptional battery life, a good charging case (if a little large) and they are fairly comfortable once you have the right fit. BUT they just didn't make me excited to listen to music. My favourite songs sounded 'thin', lacking in energy (bass) and I found myself wishing I could EQ the hell out of everything! FYI, I mostly listen to rock, so maybe they aren't well suited to that genre.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky1982

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Haven’t used wireless earbuds before but had high hopes for this after reading such good review. Firstly found it difficult to change the ear buds and once they were in my ear, although mostly secure there was a loud background buzzing constantly once turned off. And the sound seemed to vibrate through my jaw which was actually quite uncomfortable. Couldn’t bear using them so have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very good earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I’m no audio expert but these sound very good to me. Bought on the back of the techradar review. I was between these and the Cambridge Audio ones; these seemed to have fewer problems reported in reviews. Some people say that there is no bass but I suspect they haven’t seated them properly into their ears. You have to get a good seal otherwise the bass disappears. When correctly seated there is plenty of bass. And very good isolation from ambient noise. Have tested these using What Hi-Fi’s playlist to test headphones and was very impressed with the results. There is an app that goes with them but as yet, it doesn’t work. Have reported via the App Store.
customer_reviews.author: Shackster

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a single walk and then decided to send them back and revert to my £25 pair, the connectivity was dreadful, took me a 40 minute walk to finish listening to a single 3 minute track, didn't matter if I used mono or if i held my phone or had phone it left or right pocket, it just constantly dropped out. Really enjoyed the sound quality when I could get it to play but these are not designed to be used whilst moving, I could sit on the sofa they'd be fine but the moment you move they drop out. My phone is a Oneplus 7 Pro running android 10 so it's not the phone.
customer_reviews.author: g5208

customer_reviews.title: Hey Lypertek! Where's the bass?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these after reading gushing reviews from multiple sources. Sadly, they're going back. Whilst the sound is loud and clear, I just couldn't get anything like an acceptable level of bass out of them, just massively overpronounced midrange. I tried multiple devices, multiple audio formats, multiple genres of music and every eartip in the pack, all to no avail. Maybe I got a bad pair but based on my experience with them, I just don't get the hype. Even at £69 on a lightning deal, I couldn't live with the sound they produce. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Slimboy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I read the various reviews and there seemed to be an issue with lack of Bass. I found this too but I swapped the ear tips with the ones from my wired Beyerdynamic Byrons and it seemed to resolve the problem. They have great sound, are neat and the battery longevity is one of the best for true wireless. I've just taken them away on holiday and they've been perfect travelling companions. So easy to use paired with tablet on multiple flights (Including long haul). I had no issues at all with battery performance. I'm very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: nckweeks

customer_reviews.title: Ear Hear!
customer_reviews.text: These devices pair easily and the case, which both stores and charges the earbuds, is very good with the earbuds being held in magnetically. The sound quality is good to. Not exactly subtle when in the ears - quite large, and took some time for me to find the best silicon sleeves to stop them dropping out. They seem to block other external noise only when firmly fitted into the ear canal, and not any other technique I can perceive such as antiphase noise cancellation. Overall a quality product if a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: R Blake

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Sound Quality but Poor Connection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for some Anker Soundcore Life P2s that had failed (one each bud stopped working). The Lypertek's sound fabulous - real audiophile quality. Pretty easy to set up too. They're a bit fiddly to get out of their charging case, and the connection drops occasionally, but overall great value for money. UPDATE: had to return them because the connection was so poor. Really a pity because the sound was so good, but pretty useless in the end.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Very Early days
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early. Initial experience is very positive. Lovely sound. Obviously haven't run the batteries to full 70hr potential. A bit simpler than my lost Jabra 65ts. Nice charging case. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K P Haines

customer_reviews.title: Case broken
customer_reviews.text: My case was broken out of the box. But I can't return and reorder unless I want to pay another £30, as I originally got them on sale. If they are just trying to sell off the defective ones at a discount, they should really make that clear. Doesn't make a good first impression quality-wise.. Considering whether I should return before it's too late and go with another brand. These were very highly reviewed on TechRadar but now I am worried.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hodson

customer_reviews.title: Good once charged.
customer_reviews.text: These are good ear pods but I have an issue with one of them that it doesnt reliably charge and if not very carefully placed and left undisturbed it doesnt charge. (So cant just carry the case around while that one is charging). Once charged they are brilliant, as I tend to just use one at a time I went for 11 days between charging the whole case !! Took a while to get a hang of the controls and they can seem a bit clunky but now I have they are great.
customer_reviews.author: crozzie

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best I've found after trying 4 highly rated pairs. The doing is great - not quite as good as the Cambridge Audio, but better in every other way and way better than the Creative. The fit is good, doesn't fall out like the Cambridge or the Creative. The connection works everytime without issues, unlike the Cambridge and the Creative. Only issue was that the carrying case lid fell off somehow and now just separates Everytime I open it. All around best headphones for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality Bluetooth sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great in-eat phones. Really loved the ergonomics of the case also being the charger unit. Very satisfying sound quality with plenty of bass for electronic music but also lots of clarity and noise isolation is very good. Add to that fast pairing with my iPhone (6s plus) with no issues and you get very high quality earphones for an attractive price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Y. S. Finberg

customer_reviews.title: Download the app
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return these after 2 days of listening to them they have a neutral sound but songs that have bass in them sound flat to make these earbuds sound fantastic download the app from Lypertek it is not on Google play as it is a beta version on the Lypertek website it tells you the process to upgrade the earbuds they will still sound neutral but have a better rounded sound signature which makes the music sound more like it should do the sound without the app sounds good but with the app it elevates the sound to what it should sound like
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cowlishaw

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless buds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these due to my phone upgrade having no headphone jack. Had my eyes on these a month ago after watching some reviews and finally purchased when a lighting deal was on. Read some reviews stating these are not bass heavy and I'd agree to some extent but is more than sufficient for the genres of music I listen to ( DnB, Neurofunk, and Drumstep). Listening via an Android device using Poweramp which allows me to change equalizer settings and customize the sound signature to my liking. 5/5 definitely a great pair of wireless buds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd review them all then get these
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i was a little skeptical when I saw some of the earphones that these were compared to. Some costing over £200 more. I'm so blown away by them. The fit so comfortable, so light i hardly notice I'm wearing them. Passive noise cancelling is fine and even at 50% volume, pretty much everything is gone but the music. They're very loud. Really loud. Crystal clear quality, great highs and mids and bass is there, just not overpowering. Definitely one of my favourite purchases. I use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: paul wheeler

customer_reviews.title: A very pleasing product that sounds fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a musician, producer and sound engineer who's always using headphones for work and play. I'd bee trying to find a good pair and Bluetooth headphones that I like for a while. Most of the headphones I've used so far have been very good but each set I used always had one issue , either comfort or usability as they all sounded good. I've received these headphones today and they're really good. A great neutral sound that let's you lean in to the mix. Light, comfortable with a great battery/case design. Easy to use; i never read manuals and figured these out very quickly. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: steve parker

customer_reviews.title: OMG Wow! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating whether to spend more money on listening paraphenalia. I have some really good headphones but always wanted something more portable. I am soooo glad I got these! Wow. Really pleased with the sound the reviews I read are all correct - they sound great! Amazing in fact. I hate having to take them out and they have been the perfect accompaniment for when I am working at home. I get really agitated when I have to take them out and have conversations with people haha. I highly recommend them and would pay a lot more for such quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND, A LITTLE LIGHTWEIGHT, NOT BAD FOR A BUDGET PRICE
customer_reviews.text: THE HEADLINE SAYS IT ALL...GOOD SOUND. FEELS CHEAP COMPARED TO OTHERS. THE MORE YOU PAY FOR A PRODUCT THE BETTER THE QUALITY OR "PROFESIONAL" THE FEEL. WOULD I RECOMMEND IT...? YES... ARE THERE BETTER BRANDS...? YES... BUT NOT AS GOOD IN THAT PRICE RANGE.
customer_reviews.author: ABIODUN

customer_reviews.title: No bass at all
customer_reviews.text: I read some good reviews on the net about these they came up on sale..... No bass! and when pushed distorted badly. I'm not a bass freak but there has to some but nothing I played about with Poweramp the music app equaliser or tone setting as soon as you add bass and then raise the volume distortion occurred I did try different tips and my own foam tips The sound is clean etc but I'm sorry not for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: WOW.
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a set of earphones to replace my Vmoda zn's that ive had for many years (theyre also amazing btw). These actually manage to be on par, if not beat them for sound quality which i wasn't expecting. especially seeing as i picked these up for £69. As long as you have the correct tips on, the bass is clear and refined, mids and highs are clear. i also only need them at about 70% volume, and that's at a level almost too loud. i will come back to this review if anything changes, but for now im highly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: James Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Don't live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about these from the rave reviews but was disappointed when I received them. The major issue for me was the connectivity, had issues on two different phones. Sound quality is okay, didn't feel it was exceptional. Also didn't stay in the ear particularly well. Overall didn't feel like they were worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Zayed

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your money for fizzy sound and zero base
customer_reviews.text: Appalling sound, there is zero base, (despite having equalizer set to max) which leaves the sound quality fizzy and tinny, compared to seinheisers my OH has which have an immersive rich quality to its sound these are no better than my cheap wired head phones. I know you get what you pay for but these are shocking. You should of seen the look of horror on my OHs face when he tried them! And he is a big IT and music geek.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Connection kept dropping!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were good, the design and sound quality were all perfectly decent by my (middling) standards, but... the bluetooth connection would drop, not just occasionally, but routinely, several times during in a call, about once every ten mins... this was when paired with my brand new Samsung S20 (which works fine with other bluetooth headphones). Have had to send them back, and two weeks later I'm still waiting for any news of a refund...
customer_reviews.author: chkchkchk

customer_reviews.title: No regrets, these are great.
customer_reviews.text: Well impressed with these.... I've never used earbuds before but after my wife bought a cheap pair I wanted some which worked better. The battery life is phenomenal, I use these every day on my walk to and from work (40 minutes) and go a couple of weeks between charging. Sound is great, fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it for running/sports
customer_reviews.text: The earphones keep falling from my ears when I'm running. It's completely useless. Moreover, after I connected it to my iPhone 7, the mic stopped working and had to be replaced. Best of all? No free returns. So I also had to spend money on returning this defective product back to the seller. My recommendation - stay away from it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y.

customer_reviews.title: OK earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Sound great but don't fit that well, the buds fell apart after one use and when updating the seller to request a new set they stated they were unable to. Cheap price but possibly better ear buds on the market.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Recipient loves them.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. She is very pleased with them and their functionality and sound quality. However, I had a go on them and have to say I was not that impressed with the sound quality after all the online hype. I'm no expert, though, and my daughter loves them. Heigh ho.
customer_reviews.author: davelektor

customer_reviews.title: Great choice, glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: For the price I bought it, everything's great. Very happy with the sound, the noise cancellation is great, I don't have to worry with the bus engine anymore. And the battery, well, its almost 8 days since last time I charged it. A winner
customer_reviews.author: luis fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Surprisngly good
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good earphones. Clean & balanced sound with amazing battery life. Brilliant value - I think these sound far better than the highly-rated (and far more expensive) Jabra Elites. They were initially very easy to pair and bluetooth hasn't dropped out, instantly connecting when you take them out the case. I have had some connection issues and had to re-pair after a day or two of not using them, which may just be something to do with my devices. Still, not willing to give them anything less than 5* as it's such a fantastic, well-designed package, and I don't believe I can find anything better at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth wireless headphones are fantastic. I love that they come with their own charging case. They’re really comfy in my ears and the sound quality is just great. I’m super happy with them and would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive, easy setup sound great and amazing battery life. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily to use at the gym because i've read so many good reviews on them, I've found myself using them all the time now though as they connect so effortlessly (as soon as you pull one out the case it connects and is ready to go). They sound great, not overly complicated (pause/volume/skip etc all on the earbuds themselves). I have a pair of over ear, noise cancelling Sony WH-H900N which I usually use at work however I've found myself just keeping the tevi's in which I never expected. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: brendan patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones.
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly impressed with these earphones, got these for £70 on black friday, was well chuffed. I use these at work and they sound great. They even work well on games, you can hear where the enemies are coming.
customer_reviews.author: John Wai

customer_reviews.title: Very good overall!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for noise cancelling ear buds look somewhere else, But instead if you want a good ear buds which perform well excellent battery life all wrapped in an inviting price hose are for you.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sound and loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good and loud. Battery life is good. The magnetic keeps them inside really snag. Had one problem where I couldnt connect one of them, took me a while but sort it out.
customer_reviews.author: nickolay

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - but the BT connection is very poor!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound profile for my tastes and the battery life is superb - sadly the Bluetooth connection lets them down - I just have to walk to the next room for the signal to break up - I have 3 other BT 5.0 true wireless earbuds and I can walk into the garden before their signal drops ... very poor ... I wonder if I have a faulty pair ?
customer_reviews.author: D. Franks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earbuds
customer_reviews.text: My first wireless earbuds and I couldn't go any better. For a reasonable price you get a s***tone of battery life plus audio sounds amazing too. Design of a case is beautiful too, only thing I don't like are buttons. But apart from that, the connectivity is quick, once you pair your phone and take buds from case, they connected immediately. Perfect choice for not even 100£.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, outstanding battery
customer_reviews.text: Superb earbuds, outstanding battery life, the sound is very well balanced too, the bass is perhaps a bit lacking at times but this is nitpicking, the battery life is simply amazing too. They are a good fit just switch out the ear pieces, overall fantastic value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter as a Christmas present. She never has them off. Battery life is excellent as is the sound. Useful that they can be used individually also.
customer_reviews.author: Roybhoy

customer_reviews.title: Was dubious but ..
customer_reviews.text: If they stayed in a little better then they would be perfect. Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: markyrog

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, battery life, comfort. Love it all. I can just use one bud at a time which is crucial for me as I need to maintain some situational awareness while working. I'm using these up to 12 hours per day with no discomfort. After years of buying £15 buds that I knew I would eventually break the connector getting snagged out of my phone, these are life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence J Bates

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, one of the earphones broke. After mentioning this to Lypertek they were unable to sell me just the right earphone to replace the broken one. I had to buy a whole new pair. Now I am experiencing connection issues that makes the audio jump in and out with my devices. Any help would be much appreciated as the sound quality of this product is great, but it seems I have had some bad luck..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, nice finish, easy to connect and sound great. Excellent product at good price. I use with Samsumg S20 and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Considering the cost these are a fabulous wireless earbuds. I was sceptical by the cost and reviews, after using these every weekday for 2 hours a day the battery has only needed charging twice via the USB-C port in two months. These were going to be my stopgap to more expensive earbuds but I'm delighted enough with these enough to no bother and stick with the Tevi instead.
customer_reviews.author: mrcoop

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars for the sound and overall build quality.. Unfortunately had to return them as they would not stay in my ears, which is a real shame because I really like this earphones. Another thing that I didn't like was that the lid from the case was not attached to the case for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life in the case
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones, and the fact that they charge in the case is great. As I'm not a heavy user - about a couple of hours a day, so the charge capacity in the case means that I only need to charge it every other week. Sound and build quality is vey good. I replaced my bluetooth Beats with these as the beats stopped working after a couple of years for no apparent reason.
customer_reviews.author: Knut Klimmek

customer_reviews.title: Best true wireless earbuds, regardless of price
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Amazing 70 hour battery life - Vibrant and punchy sound with bass - Buttons control everything, from volume and tracks to voice assistant Cons: - Fit may not suit everyone, took me a while to get used to, they go deep inside - buttons are tactile, so you need to hold the buds to use buttons to not press them deeper into your ear
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: Quality true wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was not able expecting much since its not got the same price tag as the behemoth of the branded products, but boy am I surprised. The sound quality is really good and the noise isolation is brilliant. The RRP is possibly a little too high, but I got them in sale and we'll worth it at £70. The one thing I'm not a fan of is the material on the box, but this is such a small grip that I'm not that bothered
customer_reviews.author: Mr Yateen Patel

customer_reviews.title: Sound and battery life are great.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was great and the battery life is simply amazing, was good while it lasted, bought it on June now in September, both sides have issues with the volume... Update - was a software problem and is fixed now so highly recommend it Also get better tips, the one includes aren't that amazing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel de Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life with great sound
customer_reviews.text: These really are fabulous wireless earphones - battery life is great, they have lasted in many 4/5 hour journeys
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: White noise
customer_reviews.text: Didn't own for long before returning. For my pair there was very loud white background noise which over powered the music at lowish volume. I played around with the volume settings both on the earphones and the music source but the issue persists. I also tested it with different source devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't fit my ear
customer_reviews.text: The design is good and the audio is excellent ( for the price ); unfortunately, they did not fit in my ear and were regularly falling out. To be fair, this is an issue with the shape of my ears and only a few in ear headphones actually fit as they should. If you have a "normal" fit, I woudl highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound really good and the noise isolation works well. I had to send my first pair back because either one or the other of the headphones would stop working until I pressed the button on the side. The new pair don't seem to have this problem but they do seem to struggle in areas where there's a bit of interference such as in train stations.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, for the money I just can’t fault them. Had a few issues with them turning themselves off but this doesn’t stop me from leaving a really positive review. Sound quality and noise cancellation are excellent. Out performs others I’ve tried that are more expensive. Charging is so easy and they last really well. Would definitely recommend well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Keep falling out of my ears
customer_reviews.text: Decent earphones but I had bought them to use during exercise but couldn’t get them to stay in my ears while power walking. Tried all the supplied ear tips and putting them in my ears at different angles to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Upton

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for my daughter for use at the gym etc. She is really pleased with the sound quality and fit. Bought from Amazon on cyber Monday £69... bargain!!
customer_reviews.author: Froad

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is a great pair of headphones especially for the price. I had a problem with one of them and the customer service was happy to help and provided me with a replacement. They didn't even ask for me to send my old pair back. It's small things like these combined with a great product that make me give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good when they work, which is rare.
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrating. Sound quality and battery life excellent. But the connection process is inconsistent, the right side bud randomly crashes and can't be turned on/off/reset. Support from the manufacturer is useless, just repeating the information from the website. Feels like an underdeveloped product, despite the sound quality is avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Soni

customer_reviews.title: Good but some big flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but had issues only a few weeks in with sound becoming very low in the left bud. Also the pin in the hinge keeps popping out which is annoying as it's not possible to get back in without a special tool. Expected a bit better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CCLARKE

customer_reviews.title: Best audio buy I ever made.
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing. Battery life is excellent. External sound is drowned out. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: WeegieReviewer

customer_reviews.title: annoying white noise
customer_reviews.text: When turned on the headphones emit a considerable amount of white noise which makes listening to music impossible. Not sure whether this is normal for this model or if I got a faulty pair. Will be returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Good around wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, good sound quality and good charging case. Great service and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Yep. These are the ones.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. Easy to use, great battery life. I guess the controls aren't intuitive, but simple enough to remember. Not too uncomfortable either, given you're sticking something in your ear. Having wireless buds also means running with my partner is better since we can have a bud each.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Decent, bass is a little lacking
customer_reviews.text: Used for 2 weeks. My first set of wireless earphones. Good for calls. Fits well, even with my tiny ear holes. Bass is a little lacking but still decent for listening to music. Haven't had any issues with connectivity yet. The charging box is sleek and looks high-end. Battery life is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST truly wireless earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: These are superb! I simply don't understand why anyone would by bigger brands when these do everything better. Detailed and impressive sound and v long better life, also more descreet in the ear than others
customer_reviews.author: SteveM

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great does as says the ear buds are comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Séan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are amazing brilliant sound quality. The noise cancelling is brilliant also. I unfortunately dropped my case into the road and it got smashed to bit. I contacted the lypertek customer services and they replaced it all I had to pay was for the postage. Brilliant customer service to match the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Joanne C Saunders

customer_reviews.title: The best for sounds worry and a brilliant price
customer_reviews.text: Wicked sound -true audiophile and nice and quiet although not a true noise canceller.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: They're great. They fit brilliantly and securely. I occasionally have slight problems connecting but I suspect that's more to do with my 2 year old phone than the headphones. I also struggle to press the mechanical buttons on the headphones multiple times to advance songs, but it works fine once for answering calls.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: hidden gem
customer_reviews.text: as i expected from the reviews that i watched. cheaper than big brands but the sound quality is like defo up there with the big brands
customer_reviews.author: genetot0214

customer_reviews.title: Perfect earbuds....until they work
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was good and everything else worked fine, too bad the second day one of the earbuds is already dead and doesn’t want to connect to the case to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Modelero

customer_reviews.title: Good all-rounder if a little unspectacular.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these though have to fiddle with them a bit to get the optimum position in the ear to appreciate the sound. Do stick out but comfortable, and very decent, clean sound. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jezzer B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but won't stay in the ear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for running and commute. Very uncomfortable in the ear although they sound excellent. Not for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no sound expert but I'm really happy with these. They give a lovely clear sound. They connect quickly as soon as they're out of the box and the battery life is really good. The box is compact and easily fits in my handbags or coat pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel C

customer_reviews.title: Sounds too tinny
customer_reviews.text: Very little bass, sounded tinny and the lag when watching my tablet was awful
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing until it comes to making a phonecall
customer_reviews.text: As advertised the battery life is great and sound quality is good BUT and this is a big BUT for me when it came to making phonecalls the microphone is horrible. The listener is never able to hear what I'm saying whilst using the earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic for me. Excellent for watching movies. Battery life not as long as advertised. However ear bud on left ear keeps coming out when running. If it wasn't for that I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Derick gillies

customer_reviews.title: WAS GOOD WENT SHIT
customer_reviews.text: This product was initially extremely good initially, however, after a month of use, the right ear bud had suddenly gone quiet? I was confused, and now there is an audio level imbalance. This is extremely dissapointing
customer_reviews.author: A Patel

customer_reviews.title: Absolute bargain
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant earbuds. Great sound, great connectivity and great battery life. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use and great sound
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Mclellan

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Obviously doesn't have the best sound quality but for the 10 hour battery life and perfect call quality it works perfectly for me. Better the any other earbuds or air pods that I've tried. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although headphones work great I was very disappointed that the hinge on the charging case broke after 2 weeks of use. For that reason I scored 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best earphones you’ll find for under £100
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away by the high quality of every aspect of these earphones, but in particular the high range of sound including the incredible bass. Fantastic value for money, can’t recommend these enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bass!
customer_reviews.text: Returned two pairs of these - first problem was getting the left ear to work (had to reset them), then when I did get them working, the sound quality is very poor - there's no bass! Not sure why these have got so many good reviews/
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic headphones. Lovely clear audio for those who are audiophiles. Unbelievable battery life. Very comfortable. And at £100, you won’t find a better quality set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a month.
customer_reviews.text: These were terrific. But they only lasted a month. The right earbud just stopped working. Wouldn't charge or turn on, so I'm returning them. I'd rather get something more reliable for this price.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Best price/performance TWS
customer_reviews.text: The mids and the highs are incredible on these, while bass is accurate and solid. The best price/perf. true wireless earbuds for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Attila Hajbel

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1st month
customer_reviews.text: The product worked amazingly for the 1st month. After that the case stopped taking charge from the outlet. I could only charge the earphones while they were plugged into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: Crap Bass
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the strength of a Techradar review - bass response absolutely crap unless you force it deep into your ear canal. Not a patch on apple airbuds unfortunately - pity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected after reading all the good reviews. Damaged so had to send back
customer_reviews.text: Product received damaged and wouldn't pair with mighty. Phone was pairing ok. Button cover had come off, not glued correctly Sound was ok
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: More sound for your pound
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. I am well pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality bluetooth earbuds, amazing battery life, well worth the money. Have used extensively for the past few months and cant fault them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Left side pops out a bit
customer_reviews.text: Decent but the left one pops out of my ear quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic aside from connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Connection is not as fluid as it should be for a Bluetooth 5.0 device. Water resistance is nice, mic quality is quite poor. Overall fantastic sound detail for true wireless under £100
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LYPERTEK TEVI - True Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.0 Stereo Hi-Fi Sound Wireless Earphones, IPX7 Waterproof, Upto 70 Hours Playtime, in-Ear Bluetooth Earphones with Charging Case
product_meta.description:
Color:Matt BlackSpecification: 
Driver:High Performance 6mm Graphene Driver
Microphone: cVc 8.0 Noise Cancelling, Echo Cancellation, Noise Suppression
Frequency Response: 20 - 20000Hz
Bluetooth Specification: Bluetooth 5.0
Bluetooth Codec: Qualcomm aptX, AAC, SBC
Play Time (Max): Max 10 hours* And Max. 70 hours with Charging Case (*Volume 50% based on SBC)
Waterproof Level: IPX7
Features: Music & Volume Control, Phone Call & Voice Assistant Calls.


Package Includes:
TEVI Truly Wireless Earphone - 1pair 
Charging Case - 1pc 
S, M, L Silicone Tips - 1pair per size 
Flexfit Foam Tips (M size) -1pair 
USB Type-C cable -1pc 
Quick Start Manual - 1pc


Details Description:
LYPERTEK TEVI is a TWS earphone with Trendy Sound, Stable connection and long battery life. TEVI comes with an exclusived design 6mm Graphene Drivers. Tuned by Professional Acoustics Engineer, TEVI provides a trendy sound you will never hear before, and you will like it.

There is a easy to use main buttons to control the call, volume, and other functions. 

With Comfortable design, LYPERTEK TEVI provides the comfortable wearing & listening experiences. 

Four sizes of silicone eartips are for your choices to listen the music with completely isolated from the noisy environment. Comes with a 800mAh battery charging case, which is with USB Type-C port, can charge the TEVI 6 times. Allowing for a total play time of 70 hours.
feature_bullets: Clean, Balanced, Good Bass and Wide Sound Stage Sound Signature
Qualcomm Bluetooth 5.0 for Stable Connection & CVC8.0 for Excellent Calling Quality
Super Light and Comfortable Wearing Experience
IPX7 Waterproof, NO Fear for the Rain & Sweat
Easy to Control the Call, Volume +/-, and other functions
